document_data.name: Scarf
document_data.mainbody: '''''Scarf''''' was a common spell used by [[geisha]]. The spell was sometimes used by [[wu jen]] and was extremely rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: This spell was used for entertainment and spying. The spell caused a number of [[scarf (clothing)|scarves]] to vanish into a sort of magical limbo. The scarves remained in this limbo for up to a day; after a day, they automatically re-appeared. Geisha used this spell to magically pull scarves around them or from pockets or robes of their audience. The spell was also used to hide secret messages pinned to a scarf.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[somatic component|somatic]] and [[material component]]s.
